title: M (restored, with intro and outro) (1951, film noir, imdb score: 6.7)

sources.title: M (restored, with intro and outro) (1951, film noir, imdb score: 6.7)
sources.description: M is a 1951 American film noir directed by Joseph Losey . It is a remake of Fritz Lang 's 1931 German film of the same title about a child murderer. This version shifts the location of action from Berlin to Los Angeles and changes the killer's name from Hans Beckert to Martin W. Harrow. Both versions of M were produced by Seymour Nebenzal , whose son, Harold, was associate producer of the 1951 version. The 1951 film stars David Wayne , Howard da Silva , Luther Adler and Martin Gabel . The film was restored in 2015, with Harold Nebenzal as Executive Producer of the restoration.
